Title: 'Paranormal Activity 2' Trailer
Comment:
Just got back from a private midnight screening of this b/c we're friends with the theater manager. What I'm about to say is a small HEADS UP, not a SPOILER:

1) Is it worth watching in the theater? Absolutely yes.
2) Is it scarier than the first one (although I didn't find the first one all that scary)? A million times yes.
3) Does it awesomely tie in to the first film? Absolutely yes.
4) The first half of the movie kinda drags, but the payoff from the second half is worth it.     8.5/10

Title: 'Paranormal Activity 2' Trailer
Comment: I think it's entirely possible that this is one sequel that has serious potential to be better than the original. The documentary-style horror movie lends itself so well to a ghost-story movie (as seen in the multitude of "ghost tracker" television shows), and there are so many things they could do to scare the audience (moving shadows, objects moving on their own, jump scares from ghostly faces, etc.). Here's hoping they do this one right, and make a truly scary movie.
